header.description: 5+ years of experience as a developer specializing in agile methodologies and process enhancement. Proficient in application development and design,product design,testing,building,release,and maintenance for finance,education,commerce,and automotive industries. Skilled in delivering high-quality code for complex projects.

experience.company: universidad distrital francisco josé de caldas
description: Developed a web-based platform automating wage calculations for university teachers, integrating qualifications and research data. Streamlined process documentation for stakeholder comprehension. Successfully executed app implementation, integrating flow structures and updating research data.

Improved factoring web apps by enhancing invoice processes, creating a seamless transfer system, and implementing call center feedback for better client interactions. These updates streamlined operations, increased accuracy, and emphasized a customer-centric approach, highlighting dedication to innovation and excellence.

Managed the development of a P2P lending platform, ensuring accurate client data verification for credit requests. Facilitated credit score checks through government platforms, aiding in setting interest rates based on various factors. Developed a transparent platform to enhance credit visibility for customer service, managers, and clients, showcasing a dedication to efficient financial services.

Implemented a messaging feature in the fraud web app for client-employee chats and claim status tracking, integrating with the bank's response system. Migrated a web app to a new platform with enhanced standards, improved release flow, and increased frontend testing. Collaborated on new fraud app features, including validating rejected bank payments.

Managed a web app for vehicle tech support, handling appointments and mechanic assignments. Added steps in appointment flow for technician management at Goodyear workshops. Introduced a feature for scheduling periodic appointments for specific vehicle issues, like engine checks, improving service efficiency and client experience.

skills.list: Typescript, Unit Testing, Graphql, E2E Testing (Cypress)
Django, Python, Redux, Angular, Redux Toolkit, Golang
